front.title: Advertising Tunnel Encapsulation Capabilities in OSPF

abstract.t: Networks use tunnels for a variety of reasons. A large variety of tunnel types are defined and the ingress tunnel router needs to select a type of tunnel which is supported by the egress tunnel router and itself. This document defines how to advertise the tunnel encapsulation capabilities of egress tunnel routers in OSPF Router Information Link State Advertisement (LSAs).
